about_the_game:
Escape from the TALES!

You woke up in the dungeon of an eerily quiet mansion... and you can't remember anything...
What happened here?

Escape from a mysterious story!

ONOOW is a escape-room type adventure game. In this game, you explore the scene, get and combine various items and solve puzzles to escape from the scene and story.


@ A new experience in a familiar setting
Enjoy a classic point-and-click puzzle adventure with a gripping story full of mysteries and puzzles.

@ Expect to make several stops
Travel to unique rooms of Mansion and Town. Each rooms have their own puzzles and stories. Estimated playing time is 2 hours.

@ You know what to do
Unravel the potential secrets hidden in each rooms, earn achievements and who knows what else you might stumble upon!

name: ONOOW

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: TALESCAPE - ONOOW is an escape room game for single player. Explore in the story-rich tales and find out what the truth hidden in the mysterious story. Get items and use or combine them for escape from the story!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
